titles.title: To establish an Early Learning Challenge Fund to support States in building and strengthening systems of high-quality early learning and development programs, and for other purposes.
Supporting Early Learning Act
Supporting Early Learning Act
Supporting Early Learning Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Supporting Early Learning Act
This bill directs the Department of Education to award competitive grants to states that demonstrate either great progress in, or a commitment to, establishing and maintaining a high-quality system of early-learning programs.
